data.text: Hear ye this word which I take up against you,
The virgin of Israel is fallen; she shall no more rise:
For thus saith the Lord God;
For thus saith the Lord unto the house of Israel,
But seek not Beth-el, nor enter into Gilgal,
Seek the Lord, and ye shall live;
Ye who turn judgment to wormwood,
Seek him that maketh the seven stars and Orion,
That strengtheneth the spoiled against the strong,
They hate him that rebuketh in the gate,
Forasmuch therefore as your treading is upon the poor,
For I know your manifold transgressions and your mighty sins:
Therefore the prudent shall keep silence in that time;
Seek good, and not evil, that ye may live:
Hate the evil, and love the good, and establish judgment in the gate:
Therefore the Lord, the God of hosts, the Lord, saith thus;
And in all vineyards shall be wailing:
Woe unto you that desire the day of the Lord!
As if a man did flee from a lion, and a bear met him;
Shall not the day of the Lord be darkness, and not light?
I hate, I despise your feast days,
Though ye offer me burnt offerings and your meat offerings, I will not accept them:
Take thou away from me the noise of thy songs;
But let judgment run down as waters,
Have ye offered unto me sacrifices and offerings in the wilderness forty years, O house of Israel?
But ye have borne the tabernacle of your Moloch and Chiun your images,
Therefore will I cause you to go into captivity beyond Damascus,
